description: Erection of single storey lower ground floor rear extension with roof terrace above, and replacement of ground floor rear window with French doors
subdivision_of_building: Only  Flat A - ie lower ground and upper ground floors
decision_conditions: Notwithstanding the details shown on the drawings hereby approved, all new external materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works carried out in this connection) shall match those of the existing building in respect of materials used.REASON: To ensure a satisfactory external appearance.

<p dir="ltr" style="margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; line-height: 1.2;"><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">Details of the obscure glazed screening to a height of 1.7 m, including a sample of the proposed glass, shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority in writing before the relevant work commences on site. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thus approved and the privacy screens shall be provided before the unit is occupied and permanently retained thereafter</span><span style="font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: transparent; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-aa6b6a65-7fff-d4d9-ce30-73a4e6769f54"><br></span><span id="docs-internal-guid-a5652c94-7fff-41f7-3a1a-3d2eeffe53de"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">REASON</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-weight: 700; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">: </span><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space-collapse: preserve;">To safeguard the amenities of surrounding occupiers</span></span></p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-cc57d316-7fff-59ef-af09-f22b779210b4"></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to superstructure works, detailed specification, a drainage layout and a management &amp; maintenance plan (where applicable) of at least one suitable sustainable drainage system (i.e. a water butt with overflow, raingarden, bioretention planter box, permeable paving etc.) shall be submitted to and approved by the LPA, in consultation with the LLFA. If soakaways i.e. plastic modules and soakaway rings are used, an infiltration test must be carried out to ensure that the capacity of the soil is suitable for infiltration. It must be demonstrated that there will be no increase in surface water flow being discharged offsite and an overall reduction in peak flow rate and volume. The development shall not be carried out otherwise than in accordance with the details thereby approved.</span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;"><span style="font-size: 11pt; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; font-variant-alternates: normal; font-variant-position: normal; text-align: justify; background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline;">REASON: </span></span><span style="color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 14.6667px; text-align: justify; white-space-collapse: preserve;">To reduce the risks from surface water flooding and t</span><span style="font-size: 11pt; text-align: justify; background-color: transparent; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; white-space-collapse: preserve;">o protect and, where possible, enhance biodiversity. </span></p>
